sk.tsystems.forum.servlet

Class ForumServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • sk.tsystems.forum.servlet.ForumServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/Forum")
public class ForumServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Main servlet responsible for processing and forwarding the requests from and back to JSP file. Represents a controller part in MVC architecture implemented for this web application.
    Author:
    martinharcarik
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getUserRoles

        private void getUserRoles(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Gets the ordered list of instances of User class with their property 'userName' set to 'confirmed'. The list is ordered by the property userName. Method sets the list as an attribute of the request with name 'users'.
        Parameters:
        request - contains the list of all instances of the User class, which have their property 'userName' equal to 'confirmed'

      • addTaskToDB

        private void addTaskToDB(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Creates new instance of the Task class and then triggers the method addTaskToDatabase, which stores this instance into the database
        Parameters:
        request - provides the information needed to specify the details of the instance of the Task class

      • removeTaskFromDB

        private void removeTaskFromDB(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Triggers the method removeTask, which removes selected instance of the class Task from the database
        Parameters:
        request - provides the information needed to specify which instance of the Task class will be removed from the database. Parameter 'taskToRemove' is the value of the property 'taskID' of the Task class

      • getTasksForTopic

        private void getTasksForTopic(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Gets the list of instances of the Task class for specified intance of the Topic class. The list is stored as an attribute 'topicTasks' of instance request of the HttpServletRequest class.
        Parameters:
        request - contains the list of instances of the Task class for specified instance of the Topic class

      • openTask

        Parameters:
        request - contains the instance of the Task class

        private void doRegister(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Triggers the method registerUser of the UserServices class or sets the attribute 'error' of the instance of the HttpServletRequest class request to value 9
        Parameters:
        request - provides information needed for the method registerUser. Contains messages of successful registration or error, if the registration was not successful.

      • addUserSubscriptions

        private void addUserSubscriptions(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Triggers method setSubscriber of the TopicServices class for each instance of the Topic class whose value of property 'topicID' is equal to the value of variable topicsId.
        Parameters:
        request - provides values of parameter 'topic'

      • updateUserSubscriptions

        private void updateUserSubscriptions()
        Triggers method removeSubscriber of the TopicServices class for each instance of the Topic class that are stored in the database

      • updateTopicSubscriptions

        private void updateTopicSubscriptions(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Clears the list of instances of User class for specified instance of Topic class, if the visibility of the topic changes from 'private' to 'public'.
        Parameters:
        request - provides parameters needed to identify the instance of the Topic class, that will be updated

      • forwardToList

        private void forwardToList(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                    throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Ensures creation of a single user in case of an empty database and storing it in database. Sets the attributes 'topics' and 'userTopics' of the instance of HttpServletRequest class request. Attribute 'topics' contains the list of all instances of the Topic class stored in the database. Attribute 'userTopics' contains the list of all instances of the Topic class for current instance of the User class stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        request -
        response -
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        java.io.IOException

      • testSaveImage

        private void testSaveImage(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Prepares and stores the property 'profileImage' of the instance of the User class in the database.
        Parameters:
        request - provides the image needed to be stored for specified instance of User class

      • testGetImage

        private void testGetImage()
        Retrieves the property 'profileImage' of the instance of the User class and stores it as an image file at the location defined by the argument of the instance of the FileOutputStream class.

      • getUser

        private User getUser()
        Gets the instance of the User class that is stored as an attribute of the instance of the HttpSession class session.
        Returns:
        instance of the User class
